EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, WHITE HULL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD,
REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN 33-07N 012-00E
AT 270050 JAN. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
